name: Imperial Canal
description: A massive waterway connects major bodies of water and provides essential transportation for heavy goods and bulk cargo. The water transportation provides efficient movement of goods and people, while the strategic importance makes it a target for military control and sabotage.
atmosphere: Wide waterways carry heavy barges loaded with cargo while lock systems control water levels. Barge workers call instructions as cargo vessels navigate the controlled channels. The air carries fresh water, cargo, and commercial activity. Towpaths run alongside for draft animals pulling barges.
